messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Saskatchewan
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/1/03 12:44:52 PM, leschke@shaw.ca writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/1/03 12:44:52 PM, leschke@... writes:

<< I've heard rumours that the Saskatchewan group is close to a melt-down.
Big
disagreements about how to deal with the province in coming up with a new
homeschooling act, or something. >>

Okay. thanks! All I'd heard was the management of the conference changed.
I think they're waiting for it to settle before getting back with me. Maybe
their meetings are so taken up with the politics that they haven't gotten
back to the conference planning. But it's SOON, and I don't want the ticket
price to get so high they can't afford to get me up there any more.

Sandra

messages.subject: Saskatchewan
messages.msgSnippet: ... together ... I ve heard rumours that the Saskatchewan group is close to a melt-down.  Big disagreements about how to deal with the province in coming up
messages.messageBody:
>
> I might speak in Saskatchewan at the end of February if they get it
together
> to get me a ticket!!

I've heard rumours that the Saskatchewan group is close to a melt-down. Big
disagreements about how to deal with the province in coming up with a new
homeschooling act, or something. Surprisingly, I haven't heard anything
about HSLDA in connection.
Tia
